name: M3-A Interceptor
ability: Weapon Hardpoint: You can equip 1 [Cannon], [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade.

pilots.name: Cartel Spacer
pilots.text: MandalMotors' M3-A "Scyk" Interceptor is purchased in large quantities by the Hutt Cartel and the Car'das smugglers due to its low cost and customizability.

pilots.name: Genesis Red
pilots.caption: Tansarii Point Crime Lord
pilots.ability: After you acquire a lock, you must remove all of your focus and evade tokens. Then, gain the same number of focus and evade tokens that the locked ship has.

pilots.name: Inaldra
pilots.caption: Tansarii Point Boss
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, you may suffer 1 [Hit] damage to reroll any number of your dice.

pilots.name: Laetin A'shera
pilots.caption: Car'das Enforcer
pilots.ability: After you defend or perform an attack, if the attack missed, gain 1 evade token.

pilots.name: Quinn Jast
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 [Charge] on 1 of your equipped upgrades.

pilots.name: Serissu
pilots.caption: Flight Instructor
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, it may reroll 1 of its dice.

pilots.name: Sunny Bounder
pilots.caption: Incurable Optimist
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, after you roll or reroll your dice, if you have the same result on each of your dice, you may add 1 matching result.

pilots.name: Tansarii Point Veteran
pilots.text: The defeat of Black Sun ace Talonbane Cobra by the Car'das smugglers turned the tide of the Battle of Tansarii Point Station. Survivors of the clash are respected throughout the sector.
